snippet: Apple is in the early stages of negotiating with the major record labels for a service that would send streams of music customized to users’ tastes.
abstract: Apple is in the early stages of negotiating with the major record labels for a service that would send streams of music customized to users’ tastes; service would compete with Pandora Media in a move that could shake up the growing field of Internet radio.

byline.original: By BEN SISARIO and NICK WINGFIELD

lead_paragraph: Apple is in the early stages of negotiating with the major record labels for a service that would send streams of music customized to users’ tastes.

headline.seo: Apple Plans to Challenge Pandora in Web Radio
headline.main: Apple Plans Web Radio Challenge to Pandora
headline.print_headline: Apple Plans Web Radio Challenge To Pandora
